newsitem.title: TAIWAN: Taiwan one-month NCDs average yield at 6.447 pct.
newsitem.headline: Taiwan one-month NCDs average yield at 6.447 pct.

text.p: Taiwan's central bank issued T$5 billion in one-month negotiable certificates of deposit on Wednesday at an average yield of 6.447 percent, a central bank official said.
The range of the bids was between 6.300 and 6.500 percent.
The central bank has said its recent series of NCD issues aimed to absorb banking system's extra money, but not to dampen stock market turnover as many analysts have asserted.
On Wednesday the stock index finished 146.32 points or 1.74 percent higher at 8,576.94. Turnover was a heavy T$143 billion.
